title: English for Academic Purposes (EAP) Learner Needs Analysis Design in Industrial Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and introductory knowledge of industrial engineering
context.additional_context: A course for industrial engineering professionals to collect and analyze survey-based data for academic English needs analysis, reflecting high motivation but weak correlation between learning experience and motivation.

learning_goals: Factors influencing EAP learners' experiences (engagement, satisfaction) can be quantified using survey tools.
Learners' academic achievement motivation (self-determination, goal orientation) can be measured and analyzed using a 5-point Likert scale.
Based on needs analysis results, core elements of customized EAP education for industrial engineering (academic writing, major literature comprehension) can be derived.

resources: Learning Analytics Software (Basic Functions of Excel, SPSS)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
